modName: No Requirement to buy houses-higher prices-
summary: This simple mod remove the thane/quests requirement to buy the houses and plot of lands.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod remove the thane/quests requirement to buy the houses and plot of lands.
However...The price of every house is doubled and plot of lands is tripled.

The price of the improvements remain unchanged.

REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE

I am uploading this for a user so there might be some small issues still such as:

-When talking to the steward, the game might still show the original price, but it will only sell for the new price. ie: you will still see Breezehome for sale at 5000 but it will actually cost you the 10 000 to buy it.
author: Littleork
